summary: An ordinance providing for the laying, off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 24th Avenue Northwest, between West 73rd Street and West 75th Street, and West 75th Street, between 24th Avenue Northwest and 25th Avenue Northwest; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the entire cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
